metadata.title: CVE-2023-52429 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: dm_table_create in drivers/md/dm-table.c in the Linux kernel through 6.7.4can attempt to (in alloc_targets) allocate more than INT_MAX bytes, andcrash, because of a missing check for struct dm_ioctl.target_count.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
